Package org.apache.drill.common.config

package org.apache.drill.common.config
Internal configuration state definitions. Overall structure allows for configurations to be nested within one another to provide hierarchical organization of configuration options. Drill configurations are stored in a JSON format in files named drill-override.conf available on the classpath. See the DrillConfig class for more information on config file loading.
